    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Thank you for your participation in the OCC Summer Programme Lucky Draw which was held from 9 to 18 August 2024 (both dates inclusive). Winners will be notified through registered mail which will be sent on or before 2 September 2024. ​</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can find the winners list (PDF) <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/insurance/life/offers/2024-occ-lucky-draw.pdf" target="_blank" data-pid="PWS_HK_EN_D160223_1" rel="noopener" data-tms-element-tracked="true"><span aria-hidden="true">here</span><span class="visuallyhidden">here  This link will open in a new window</span></a>.</p>
